post.description: Create a new collection within a site

parameters.name: site_name
parameters.description: A valid site name of an existing website

name.description: The name of the collection (must not start with $)

customer_lock.description: The lock state of the collection. Must be one of `unlocked`, `structure_locked` or `locked`

static_page_bindable.description: Allows collection data to be connected to widgets on a non-dynamic page.

fields.description: You must define at least one field when creating an internal collection (when `external_details.enabled` is set to false).

parameters.description: Name of the current collection

name.description: The new name of the collection (must not start with $)

customer_lock.description: The lock state of the collection. Must be one of `unlocked`, `structure_locked` or `locked`

static_page_bindable.description: Allows collection data to be connected to widgets on a non-dynamic page.

get.description: Getting a site via App Store APIs

parameters.description: The specific access token to access this site API.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Your App Account's username and password, based64'd.

post.description: Updating a site via App Store APIs

parameters.name: x-duda-access-token
parameters.description: The specific access token to access this site API.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Your App Account's username and password, based64'd.

site_domain.description: The primary domain of the website. Change this with extreme caution.

default_domain_prefix.description: The prefix of the sub-domain or alternate the site first renders under.

external_uid.description: Referrs to the owner of the website and some external reference of the website.

lang.description: Two char lang code for the website default language.

additionalLanguages.description: An array of secondary languages for the website, in two character format.

force_https.description: If the website always redirect visitors to https or not.

title.description: Default title for pages which does not have one.

description.description: Default description for pages which don't have them.

get.description: Get the data that exists within the content library of a website.

parameters.name: site_name
parameters.description: A valid site name of an existing website

address_geolocation.example: 1833 Harvard St NW, Washington, DC 20009, USA

overview.example: Oh, Duda? Duda is a variation of "Dude", who just happens to be the main character in one of our favorite movies of all time: The Big Lebowski. You should watch it some time. Look out for that ferret!

text.example: THE WEB DESIGN PLATFORM FOR Scaling Your Agency

about_us.example: Duda is a leading website builder for web professionals and agencies of all sizes. Our website builder enables you to build amazing, feature-rich websites that are perfectly suited to desktop, tablet and mobile. Our mobile builder enables you to build mobile-only sites from scratch, or based on an existing desktop site or Facebook business page. Duda allows professionals and agencies to build high-converting, personalized websites at scale. Duda optimizes each and every site for Google PageSpeed.

post.description: Update the data that exists within the content library. Once updated the data is ready for immediate use within the editor.

draft_status.description: If marked as STAGED_DRAFT, the page will be published alongside the next publish of the site. If DRAFT, then the page will not be published and a currently published page will be unpublished. You cannot set the home page as draft.

get.description: Get the manifest of an App.

parameters.name: app_uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the App

parameters.name: x-duda-access-token
parameters.description: The specific access token to access this site API.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Your App Account's username and password, base64'd.

app_long_description.example: This app can do this a that
This app can do this a that

post.description: Update the manifest of an App.

parameters.name: app_uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the App

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Your App Account's username and password, base64'd.

endpoint.description: Endpoint where all webhooks are sent.

events.description: An array of strings for webhooks you want sent. See documentation about what's allowed.

scopes.description: An array of strings of supported scopes. See documentation for all supported scopes.

public_key.description: Your Apps public key, generated at time of App creation. Will never change.

installation_endpoint.description: URL Where Duda will notify when a website installs your App.

uninstallation_endpoint.description: URL Where Duda will notify when someone uninstalls your App.

updowngrade_installation_endpoint.description: URL Where Duda will notify upon plan upgrade or change of state for your App.

base_sso_url.description: URL of your App UI where Duda should SSO users into.

supported_locales.description: Two character language codes your App supports.

app_profile.description: An object containing language key that points to the profile for that language.

app_logo.description: Absolute URL to the logo of your App.

app_short_description.description: A short description of your App.

app_long_description.description: A long description of your App

public_page.description: The URL to the home page for your app or company.

terms_of_service_page.description: A URL to your terms of service.

privacy_note_page.description: A URL to your privacy policy.

wl_app_profile.description: The white labeled version of your App profile, keyed with a language code.

app_logo.description: Absolute URL to the logo of your App.

app_short_description.description: A short description of your App.

app_long_description.description: A long description of your App

public_page.description: The URL to the home page for your app or company.

terms_of_service_page.description: A URL to your terms of service.

privacy_note_page.description: A URL to your privacy policy.

is_hidden.description: If the plan is shown to customers or not.

plan_grade.description: The order of the plan as it will show in the UI.

default_plan_uuid.description: Skips the select plan selection page and allows users to install only a specific starting plan. Plan must be free or trial.

required_fields.description: Required fields that must exist in the content library before installing. Can be "EMAIL" and "LOCATION".

window_type.description: How your App SSO is opened from Duda. IFRAME strongly recommended.

visible_to_clients.description: If the App will be shown to end clients (customers of an agency)

is_in_beta.description: If the App should be shown as 'coming soon' in the App Store.

app_long_description.example: This app can do this a that
This app can do this a that

get.description: Get products page. Default page response size is 50, max requested page size is 100.

parameters.name: site_name
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the target Site.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset for elements (0..N)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(asc|desc). Sort order is optional, default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: x-duda-access-token
parameters.description: The specific access token to access this site API.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Your App Account's username and password, base64'd.

description.example: The most amazing t shirt ever sold
Amazing T-shirt made with 100% biologic cotton

post.description: Creates new product for referenced catalog

parameters.name: site_name
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the target Site.

parameters.name: x-duda-access-token
parameters.description: This sites specific access token.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Your App Account's username and password, base64'd.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit. A unique ID that identifies the product in your inventory.

description.description: A description of the product which gets displayed on the product page. Can be HTML format.

images.description: Product Images. First image in array is primary.

url.description: A URL directly to where the image is. Should be publically available.

description.description: The meta description applied to the product.

prices.description: Product Prices. Today, we only support a single currency per product. We will extend this in the future.

compare_at_price.description: The price at which the product is compared to.

status.description: If the product is available on the store.

options.description: List of options and values to chose from, will be used to create the product variations

choices.description: Values available for the given option

description.example: The most amazing t shirt ever sold
Amazing T-shirt made with 100% biologic cotton

parameters.name: site_name
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the target site.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: One of IN_PROGRESS or ABANDONED

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: One of LIVE or TEST

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Valid cart id. This value will be used for cursor pagination to return all items in the sort order after this id.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to be returned

parameters.name: site_name

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Payment Session ID. Retrieved during checkout when handling a payment gateway flow.

post.description: Verify that the payment is a success and Duda can properly save that it is created.

parameters.name: site_name
parameters.description: Unique site for which the payment is taking place.

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: The payment session ID being confirmed

session_id.description: The unique Session ID being confirmed/saved.

transaction_id.description: Required only if state is PROCESSED. Unique identifier from your payment gateway to assign to the order

instructions.description: Optionally define if state is PROCESSED. Information text diplayed in the checkout confirmation screen

icon.description: URL to the icon representing the payment gateway.

error.description: If the state is failed, then you can also pass detailed error messages to help the merchant understand why the payment failed.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset for elements (0..N)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Property used to sort orders

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The sort direction, either "asc" or "desc"

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the target Order.

id.description: ID that references the item you want to update.

metadata.description: This is the only updateable item in the items object. A metadata field related to the product that was sold.

first_name.description: First name of the shopper's billing address/details.

last_name.description: Last name of the shopper's billing address/details.

full_name.description: Full name name of the shopper's billing address/details.

address_1.description: Line 1 of the address for billing details.

address_2.description: Line 2 of the address for billing details. This is not always set.

region.description: Region, state or other area for the billing address.

sub_locality.description: The related sub_locality of the billing address. Often empty.

street_number.description: The street number for the address.

street_name.description: Street name for the billing address

country.description: Country where the order took place.
